about.title: About
about.subtitle: Frontend is a developer with 5+ years of commercial experience. I specialize in developing product interfaces for Vue.js and Nuxt.js (Vue 2/3, Nuxt 2/3) using TypeScript. He worked with legacy code, participated in the design of SPA architecture and SSR applications, applied business logic to composables and implemented testing in existing projects. In my work, I focus on readable code, predictable architecture, and stability in production. Projects with real users, complex logic, and a long lifecycle are interesting.
